prompts.title: Add 'delivered_at' field to parcel type
prompts.system: You are a senior software engineer working on a React and TypeScript codebase. Your task is to modify type definitions.

context.prdSummary: Extend the parcel type definition to include the 'delivered_at' field. This field is needed for both UI display and API integration.
relevantRepoConventions: Do not use hex colors directly; use design tokens.
Prefer Ant Design components for consistent UI patterns.
evidence: The 'delivered_at' field is needed for both UI display and API integration.

instructions: Add 'delivered_at' field to the Parcel type definition in src/types/parcel.ts.
Ensure the 'delivered_at' field is optional and can be null.
guardrails: DO NOT modify files outside this step's scope.
DO NOT remove existing exports without checking consumers.
ALWAYS follow existing code style.
deliverables: Modified src/types/parcel.ts with the 'delivered_at' field added.
